channel.description: Recent content in TypeScript on Byte Ebi üç§

item.title: Class and Interface in TypeScript
item.description:
Introduces the basic concepts of TypeScript Classes and Interfaces.
It also covers class implementation and interface inheritance examples.

item.title: Basic Data Type in TypeScript
item.description:
Introduction to TypeScript’s basic types and syntax examples,
including examples of basic function syntax, arrow functions, anonymous functions, and function overloading.

item.title: TypeScript Environment Setup
item.description:
Set up a TypeScript development environment
Using NVM to install Node.js and npm, installing development tools.
